title: Name the Best Grand Theft Auto Game

transcript_chunks.text: name the best Grand Theft Auto game Vice City Vice City is our 40 Point answer five Grand Theft Auto 5 Grand Theft Auto 5 is our 50 point you got to go with it you know what I mean that's good Grand the AO San Andreas San Andreas is our 30 point answer GTA 3 GTA 3 is our 10-point answer which means we only have our 20 point answer left Mike Howard I'm going to go with Grand Theft Auto 4 Mike says Grand Theft Auto 4 Grand Theft Auto 4 is our 20 point
